description: This file defines the 'EventsPage' widget for a Flutter app, which displays a list of events using provider for state management. It includes a placeholder for when there are no events and a private widget for the empty state UI.

classes.name: EventsPage
classes.description: A stateless widget that displays a list of events or an empty state message.

classes.name: _EmptyState
classes.description: A private stateless widget used to display a message when there are no events.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the EventsPage, displaying either a list of events or an empty state.

methods.name: _EmptyState.build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the empty state display, showing an icon and text message.
